ygData.subject: RE: Bard letter to GZ
ygData.msgSnippet: The list he s compiled seems more like a request for enhancements.  This is what I m trying to avoid.  Correct me if I m wrong.  I just want answers/timeframes
ygData.messageBody:
The list he's compiled seems more like a request for enhancements. This is
what I'm trying to avoid. Correct me if I'm wrong. I just want
answers/timeframes for when problems will be fixed.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 41 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 3:00 PM
To: EQBards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Bard letter to GZ


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

There is a level 50 bard on the Concert Hall message board looking to put
together a letter to GZ as well. It may be a good idea to fuse these two
letters...
